subject: Automobiles
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
Drivers Licenses
lead_paragraph: Kyle Busch, the Nascar Sprint Cup points leader, lost his driver’s license for 45 days for driving 128 miles per hour in Statesville, N.C., in a car worth nearly $400,000.
snippet: Kyle Busch, the Nascar Sprint Cup points leader, lost his driver’s license for 45 days for driving 128 miles per hour in Statesville, N.C., in a car worth nearly $400,000.
